Pablo Vallejo

About

Pablo Vallejo is a Web Developer currently working at ByPeople. He enjoys writing web applications, helping to make the web better and likes both Front-end and Back-end development.

Currently he lives in Bogotá, where there's a great community of web developers, and folks doing open source.

Contact

You can find me on GitHub as @PabloVallejo or, if you want to get in touch, just leave me a message at pabloninety@gmail.com.

About This site

This site is made Using Jekyll and is hosted on Github. The design and fonts are inspired on Tommi Kaikkonen's blog.
